docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I am Sunday Usman, a Reseacher in the Department of Systems and Industrial Engineering at the University of Arizona, United States. My research focuses on lifecycle assessments, techno-economic analyses, waste-to-energy conversion, and rare earth metal recycling, with a particular emphasis on innovative processes for clean energy applications. Additionally, I explore the application of Geographic Information Systems (GIS) for site suitability analysis.
